positive_examples: This is an example of silicone lubricant.
The silicone lubricant demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed silicone lubricant in this context.
A typical case of silicone lubricant would involve these features.
The concept of silicone lubricant applies here.
A synthetic lubricant based on silicone compounds, known for its temperature stability and non-reactive properties.
negative_examples: This is an example of grease, not silicone lubricant.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Grease, or other types of Lubricant

definition: A synthetic lubricant based on silicone polymers, offering wide temperature stability.
